standards.name: OWASP Top 10
standards.how_to_get: Implement scanning coverage for all 10 OWASP categories in the scanner modules

items.name: A01:2021 Broken Access Control
items.description: Access control enforces policy so users cannot act outside their intended permissions

items.name: A02:2021 Cryptographic Failures
items.description: Failures related to cryptography which often lead to sensitive data exposure

items.name: A03:2021 Injection
items.description: SQL injection, XSS, and other injection flaws
items.what_we_have: SQLi scanner, XSS scanner, command injection checks

standards.name: SOC 2 Type II
standards.how_to_get: Engage a CPA firm (e.g., Schellman, A-LIGN) to perform SOC 2 Type II audit. Requires documented policies, evidence of controls operating over 6+ months.

items.name: CC1: Control Environment
items.description: Organizational commitment to integrity and ethical values
items.what_we_need: Documented security policies, org chart, code of conduct

items.name: CC6: Logical & Physical Access
items.what_we_need: MFA, access reviews, privileged access management
